title: IDF soldiers should refuse orders that may be war crimes, Israeli ex-security adviser tells BBC
content: A former senior security official tells Fergal Keane that Israel might be committing war crimes in northern Gaza.
summary: A former senior security official tells Fergal Keane that Israel might be committing war crimes in northern Gaza.

title: At least five dead in attack at Turkish aviation company
content: Authorities say Kurdish rebel group the PKK are behind the attack, which left another 22 people injured.
summary: Authorities say Kurdish rebel group the PKK are behind the attack, which left another 22 people injured.

title: North Korea troops in Ukraine would escalate conflict, Lukashenko tells BBC

summary: Vladimir Putin's closest ally speaks to Steve Rosenberg about the war, nuclear weapons and relations with the West.

title: Lebanon local official says 19 killed in Israeli strike on family's home
content: Women and children were among the dead following Tuesday's strike in Teffahta, a local official says.
summary: Women and children were among the dead following Tuesday's strike in Teffahta, a local official says.

title: Georgia's ruling party holds mass rally ahead of crucial vote
content: Three days before Georgians vote, the ruling party's founder tells supporters "we choose peace, not war".
summary: Three days before Georgians vote, the ruling party's founder tells supporters "we choose peace, not war".

title: Tarzan star Ron Ely dies aged 86
content: The actor also appeared in hit 1980s television shows Wonder Woman and The Love Boat.

title: Gisèle Pelicot takes stand in French mass rape trial

summary: She tells a court she wants women who have been raped to know that "it's not for us to have shame - it's for them".

title: Israel strikes Lebanon's Tyre, close to site of ancient Roman ruins
content: Videos showed clouds of smoke rising from a central area near a Unesco-listed archaeological site.

title: Liberation theology icon and champion of the poor Gutiérrez dies
content: Gustavo Gutiérrez founded liberation theology, both revered and reviled in the Catholic Church.

title: Nigeria drops charges against Binance cryptocurrency boss

title: Russians accused of crimes offered choice - go to war instead of court

title: Idris Elba: Why I'm planning a move to Africa
content: The British star is backing film projects across the continent and wants to be closer to the action.
